mapper.update: update jh_title set title_state = #{titleState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_questionone = #{titleQuestionone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_questiontwo = #{titleQuestiontwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_questionthree = #{titleQuestionthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_questionfour = #{titleQuestionfour,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where title_id = #{titleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select title_id, title_name, title_state, title_questionone, title_questiontwo, title_questionthree, title_questionfour from jh_title
select title_id, title_name, title_state from jh_title
